definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
see 猴麵包樹|猴面包树[hou2 mian4 bao1 shu4]

sentences.english: The local store has started selling baguettes and Belgian beers.
sentences.chinese: 当地的商店已经开始出售法国棍式面包和比利时啤酒。

sentences.english: The United States has been the world’s breadbasket for more than half a century.
sentences.chinese: 过去的半个世纪内，美国一直是世界的面包篮子。

sentences.english: All grocery shopping bags contain at least one stick of French bread.
sentences.chinese: 所有超市购物袋里都装着至少一根法式长棍面包。

sentences.english: I bought a loaf of bread at the baker's.
sentences.chinese: 这面包干了，我得去同面包师说一说。

sentences.english: I bought a loaf of bread at the baker's.
sentences.chinese: 这面包干了，我得去同面包师说一说。

sentences.english: I wolfed the whole two pounds of bread without stopping to take breath.
sentences.chinese: 我狼吞虎咽地一口气把整整两磅面包干掉了。

sentences.english: Went to Centurymart with Tom, buying a bag of cookies at bakery.
sentences.chinese: 今天和小洋去联华，在卖面包的地方买了袋饼干。

sentences.english: Kelli Kirk is a writer, baker, mom and human resources manager.
sentences.chinese: 凯利柯克是一位作家，面包师，妈妈和人力资源经理。

sentences.english: They were given nothing other than dry bread and water for their evening meal.
sentences.chinese: 他们只得到了干面包和水作晚餐。

sentences.english: We are trying to help out by delivering flour to bakeries.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在设法给面包店送去面粉，帮助它们度过难关。

sentences.english: On the half way to the mountain, the tourists had a rest and snacked on some bread.
sentences.chinese: 在登山的途中，游客们休息了会儿，吃了点儿面包。

sentences.english: You say you're looking for the French bakery?
sentences.chinese: 你是说你在找那个法式面包店吗？

sentences.english: The bread can be fresh or stale and crusts can be left on or removed.
sentences.chinese: 面包可新鲜或陈旧的和结壳可以留在或删除。

sentences.english: The bird pecked at the bread crumbs.
And then stir in the cheese and bread crumbs.
sentences.chinese: 之后加入奶酪和面包碎搅拌。

sentences.english: Frank, how about some bacon with your French toast ?
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克，弄点儿咸肉就着煎面包片儿吃好不好？
